title: Immersive Language Education Simulation for Enhancing Project-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language teaching proficiency and experience with digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Derivation of practical PBL improvement strategies immediately applicable in educational settings

learning_goals: Learners enhance PBL task design skills by utilizing three-stage project matching indicators in VR environments.
Develop at least two strategies to differentiate final deliverables based on the presence or absence of a client.
Text analysis techniques can be applied to quantitatively evaluate qualitative changes in learner activity reports
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
